thread.title: Illegal immigrant dad threatened to KILL his children unless he got more benefits
thread.title_full: Illegal immigrant dad threatened to KILL his children unless he got more benefits

title: Illegal immigrant dad threatened to KILL his children unless he got more benefits

organizations.name: family division of the high court

text:
The parents also coached one child to make false allegations of sexual abuse against school staff and social workers. 
A judge has said the children should be put up for adoption. 
Details of the case has emerged in a ruling by the judge following a private hearing in the Family Division of the High Court in London. 
Both parents came to the UK about 13 years ago. 
The mum arrived legitimately but then overstayed her visa. There was no record of her husband’s entry. 
Both had been refused permission to stay. Benefit scroungers we LOVE to hate Wednesday, 5th October 2016 Look back on the previous and current benefit claiments that have made national headlines, and for some celebrity status. 1 / 13 
Three years ago, the family became destitute and social workers were alerted to their plight. 
The council provided cash – but the parents demanded more and more. 
At one point the man had threatened to jump off a bridge with the children if a "new house and financial assistance to the level he sought" was not provided. 
The couple had used the children "directly to demand money" and had hidden the youngsters in cupboards to stop social workers seeing them. 
Mr Justice Keehan said social workers thought that the youngsters had been "puppets" in a "war of attrition". Related articles
